TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_tay_Plmwan, title = Plmwan, year = 2025, month = May, day = 5, note = {In Wikipedia [Atayal]}, url = {https://tay.wikipedia.org/wiki/Plmwan} }

S.FORM: alang Plmwan ga niya mki sku Sincik Keng atu Nahuy go, kwara sali buwan nya ga 36 buwan, 137 hi ku kwara s'uli tayan. s'uli tayan pinspngan Gyencumin ga 97% kyan ku 133 hi, binah ga, 'yat kahun sku pinspngan Gyencumin ga 3% kyan ku 4 hi nya. pinspung na linhuyan Gyencumin ga, Tayan 93%, Amis 1%, Paywan 1%, saySiyat 1%, binah lihuyan s'uli 1%. maki qu ngasal bziran. rhzyal kki'an tay 'llaw na Plmwan hya' ga rgyax krahu'. tay 'zil na Plmwan hya' ga rgyax krahu'. tay mkyahu' na Plmwan hya' ga rgyax krahu'. tay mkraya' na Plmwan hya' ga rgyax krahu'. tay 'zil na Plmwan hya' ga Quri . tay 'llaw na Plmwan hya' ga Tayax. rekisi kayal kyokay ssquliq pinlpgan ppqbaqan pqwasan biru 'laqi' cikuy pqwasan biru 'laqi' mrkyas tuqi 'san basu kisya' glgan spyangan na pinbahu Ubuy qqmayh

alang Plmwan ga niya mki sko Sincik Keng ato Nahoy go, kwara sali bowan nya ga 36 bowan, 137 hi ko kwara s'oli tayan. s'oli tayan pinspngan Gyencomin ga 97% kyan ko 133 hi, binah ga, 'yat kahon sko pinspngan Gyencomin ga 3% kyan ko 4 hi nya. pinspong na linhoyan Gyencomin ga, Tayan 93%, Amis 1%, Paywan 1%, saySiyat 1%, binah lihoyan s'oli 1%. maki qo ngasal bziran. rhzyal kki'an tay 'llaw na Plmwan hya' ga rgyax kraho'. tay 'zil na Plmwan hya' ga rgyax kraho'. tay mkyaho' na Plmwan hya' ga rgyax kraho'. tay mkraya' na Plmwan hya' ga rgyax kraho'. tay 'zil na Plmwan hya' ga Qori . tay 'llaw na Plmwan hya' ga Tayax. rekisi kayal kyokay ssqoliq pinlpgan ppqbaqan pqwasan biro 'laqi' cikoy pqwasan biro 'laqi' mrkyas toqi 'san baso kisya' glgan spyangan na pinbaho Uboy qqmayh
